attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I mean, how could someone make an app this bad? This provides nothing for me at all. Just take it down. I feel like it’s just making me mad just being here. Like, no❤️.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: The Cheeto made my horse sick so I don’t recommend getting this app and it also made my farm look bad so if you want to buy farm animals don’t show this this app because it will kill them. 👁👄👁😌😭😭😭😭😭😭😭😱😱😱😰😥😓🤢🤮🤢🤮🤢😷😷😷😷😷🤒🤒🤒🤒

attributes.title: ❤️no ✌️😐
attributes.review: This app is dangerous to my well-being✋. This monstrosity led to me profusely VOMITTING all over my room. Such pictures should not be on apps like this! Especially when you first open it! It’s- I’m uncomfortable 😿😤😔. This is NOT okay 😖😫

attributes.title: Just no
attributes.review: Hey I’m going back home now I have a couple minutes I wanna was a little late because I’m not going home I want y’all back I love y’all and I’m deleting this because this app is trash

attributes.title: my daughter stopped talking to me
attributes.review:
i downloaded this app as a way to feel as close as humanly possible to our trident true president! my husband does not make love to me anymore..  and i just needed something besides my donald trump body pillow to get me off you know !🤗     so anyways i download the app and my daughter sees it on my phone! she’s a real snowflake and got soo upset 😣
so i blame app for failed marriage and losing daughter

attributes.title: Nude photo?
attributes.review: When opening the app, I was greeted with a nude photo of the president? It was very disturbing. Thank Jesus my children weren’t around to see his tiny crotch. I definitely will not be using this app again. I’m very disappointed Mr. Trump.

attributes.title: Terrible trash
attributes.review: When I opened the app it told me that a Cheeto was trying to take down tik tok which is completely disrespectful. I then saw the Cheetos 🦐 which was very disgusting. So I’m think this app is pointless and disturbing 🤢🤮

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app was not at all helpful and it’s a horrible app they shouldn’t even be on Apple. Shouldn’t be an app💀😬 they need to delete this app horrible. Not helpful at all worst app ever needs to be taken down

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: Why are you banning tiktok tiktok has over 800 million people on it and a lot of small accounts you just want to take away everyone’s hard work gaining followers

attributes.title: Beyond Hurtful
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to get updates on the rally’s but the second I opened the app it pulled up all of my selfies from all social media platforms and started roasting me. They even said my dog looked like a stinky rat
